txt.en: Miruhir has asked you to shoo away birds that are eating valuable wine grapes at his vineyard in Iáphel.\n\nShoo away birds.
The bird flies away, forlorn and distraught
TBD It seems to say 'curse you! I wasn't done eating!'
TBD It seems to say 'curse you! I wasn't done eating!'

'I have a sickle-fly problem and a bird problem. You would think the birds would eat the sickle-flies for me but no, that would be too convenient.\n\n'The crows have seen fit to roost amongst the trellises along the western slope of the hill, just outside Iáphel's walls. Please shoo them away for me.'
TBD I have already eaten my fill. I have already won.
TBD The bird squawks as it flies away. It swears it will have its revenge.
You should tell Miruhir that you have shooed the birds away.\n\nMiruhir can be found in Iáphel.
The bird seems to say 'Curse you! I wasn't done eating!'
Pesky birds are feasting on wine grapes in Iáphel.
You are confident that birds cannot cry, but this bird sounds like it is crying
The bird seems to say, 'Drive me off, I care not. M
